name: RED ELECTRICA DE ESPAÑA, SAU
goal:
RED ELÉCTRICA DE ESPAÑA (REE) IS THE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM OPERATOR OF THE SPANISH ELECTRICITY SYSTEM.
REE MISSION IS TO GUARANTEE THE CORRECT FUNCTIONING OF THE ELECTRICITY SYSTEM AND TO ENSURE THE CONTINUITY AND SECURITY OF THE ELECTRICITY SUPPLY AT ALL TIMES. TO THAT END REE SUPERVISES AND COORDINATES THE GENERATION-TRANSMISSION SYSTEM AND MANAGES THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE TRANSMISSION GRID.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
ENERGY UNION
CLIMATE ACTION
ENVIRONMENT
INTERNAL ENERGY MARKET
INFRASTRUCTURES AND INTERCONNECTIONS
RESEARCH AND INNOVATION
